content.prompt: The discussion of Adam and Eveâ€™s actions is best understood in the context of which of the following developments of the Italian Renaissance?

choices.label: The growth of new humanist approaches that emphasized individuality
The development of new methods of scientific inquiry
The emphasis on secular models for political behavior
The concern religious authorities had over their relative prestige

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
